A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I saw this Sunday night real expecting a lot. This new Twilight/Star-Trek/Disney barf parade was great! For stars though it was an utter disappointment. The questions i had were answer but in the most boring way possible. So many things didn't make any sense. If you're a true fan of star wars or star wars lore and backstory don't have your hopes up for this movie. If you're someone who doesn't know a lot about star wars or doesn't care then you'll probably really like the movie.
